title: Logging in.... connection errors
body: Hi guys so about a week ago for some reason my League of legends stopped working, and i cant even play anymore at home. I put in my username and password and it says logging in.... it stays like that for about 10 seconds and then afterwards it immediately shows connection error. when i click 'here' to try and solve the problem, none of the solutions work. i have contacted technical support and they still haven't replied to me. is there any way i can fix this? thank u

replies.body:
Yea same problem here, cant play League anymore, i am with Telstra tho i made a thread about it some time ago...

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/6nsIb1HL-cant-login-with-home-internet
Hey Fraekin Emdjo - what ISP are you with?  Have you changed anything about your home network or connection setup in the last week or so?
I'm with DoDo. no haven't really changed anything
